error.min: {property} has fewer elements than the minimum allowed.
error.max: {property} has more elements than the maximum allowed.
error.minLength: {property} is shorter than the minimum length allowed.
error.isEmail: {property} should be a valid email address.
error.isMongoId: {property} should be a valid MongoDB ObjectId.
error.isEnum: {property} does not match any valid enum value.
error.arrayMinSize: {property} array should contain at least {value} elements.
error.arrayMaxSize: {property} array should contain no more than {value} elements.
error.arrayUnique: {property} array should contain unique elements only.
error.minDate: {property} is earlier than the minimum allowed date.
error.maxDate: {property} is later than the maximum allowed date.
error.isIn: {property} must be one of the allowed values.
error.isNotIn: {property} should not be one of the forbidden values.
error.isBase64: {property} should be a valid Base64 string.
error.isCreditCard: {property} should be a valid credit card number.
error.isCurrency: {property} should be a valid currency amount.
error.isFQDN: {property} should be a valid fully qualified domain name.
error.isVariableWidth: {property} should contain both full-width and half-width characters.
error.isHexColor: {property} should be a valid hexadecimal color.
error.isHSL: {property} should be a valid HSL color.
error.isHexadecimal: {property} should be a valid hexadecimal string.
error.isJSON: {property} should be a valid JSON string.
error.isMobilePhone: {property} should be a valid mobile phone number for {value}.
error.isPhoneNumber: {property} should be a valid phone number.
error.isISO31661Alpha2: {property} should be a valid ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 code.
error.isISO31661Alpha3: {property} should be a valid ISO 3166-1 alpha-3 code.
error.isBase58: {property} should be a valid Base58 string.
error.isBIC: {property} should be a valid BIC code.
error.isBtcAddress: {property} should be a valid Bitcoin address.
error.isDataURI: {property} should be a valid data URI.
error.isEthereumAddress: {property} should be a valid Ethereum address.
error.isFirebasePushId: {property} should be a valid Firebase Push ID.
error.isISO4217CurrencyCode: {property} should be a valid ISO 4217 currency code.
error.isTimeZone: {property} should be a valid time zone.
error.isTaxId: {property} should be a valid tax ID.
error.isIdentityCard: {property} should be a valid identity card number for {value}.
error.isEAN: {property} should be a valid {value}-digit EAN code.
error.validateNested: {property} should be a valid nested object.
error.validatePromise: {property} should resolve to a valid value.

isPassword.strong: {property} must be a strong password containing uppercase, lowercase, numbers, and special characters.

error.safeString: {property} should be a safe string, containing only A-Z, a-z, 0-9, and the symbols '_-'.
error.mobileNumberAllowed: {property} should be a valid mobile number.
error.maxBinaryFile: {property} size exceeds the maximum allowed. It should be less than {value}.
error.lessThanEqual: {property} should be less than or equal to {value}.
error.greaterThanEqual: {property} should be greater than or equal to {value}.
error.isNotEmptyObject: {property} should not be an empty object.
error.isIP: {property} should be a valid IP address.
error.isISO8601: {property} should be a valid ISO8601 date string.

greaterThanOtherProperty.invalid: {property} must be greater than the related property.

greaterThanEqualOtherProperty.invalid: {property} must be greater than or equal to the related property.

lessThanOtherProperty.invalid: {property} must be less than the related property.

lessThanEqualOtherProperty.invalid: {property} must be less than or equal to the related property.

email.invalid: {property} should be a valid email address.
email.domainLength: {property} domain length should be less than or equal to 255 characters.
email.localPartMaxLength: {property} local part length should be less than or equal to 64 characters.
email.localPartDot: {property} local part should not start or end with a dot.
email.consecutiveDots: {property} local part should not contain consecutive dots.
email.invalidChars: {property} local part should not contain invalid characters.
email.domainDash: {property} domain cannot start or end with a dash.
email.domainDot: {property} domain cannot start or end with a dot.
email.domainFormat: {property} domain must have at least 2 labels.
email.domainLabelDash: {property} domain label cannot start or end with a dash.
email.domainInvalidChars: {property} domain label can only contain alphanumeric and dash characters.
email.invalidTLD: {property} TLD must be at least 2 characters and contain only letters.
